about.summary: Flake8 plugin to check for copyright notices in all python files.

name: flake8-copyright
raw_recipe:
{% set name = "flake8-copyright" %}
{% set version = "0.2.0" %}
{% set sha256 = "aeef26eb4d5223c9cd5b101e68175fcef6d2b353bf36da688fdde62fccfe2b73" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  fn: {{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: {{ sha256 }}

build:
  number: 0
  script: python setup.py install --single-version-externally-managed --record record.txt

requirements:
  build:
    - python
    - setuptools
  run:
    - python
    - flake8

test:
  commands:
    - "flake8 --version | grep flake8_copyright:"

about:
  home: https://github.com/savoirfairelinux/flake8-copyright
  license: LGPL-3.0
  license_family: LGPL
  summary: 'Flake8 plugin to check for copyright notices in all python files.'
  dev_url: https://github.com/savoirfairelinux/flake8-copyright

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - dopplershift
